Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Pepcon (peptide consensus sequence, synthetic AMPs20, UCLL1)
Sequence Information.Source: Designed based on sequence homology with scorpion linear peptides, peptide library analysis, man-made sequences

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of THE PEPTIDE shows 94.4% similarity toScorpion AamAP1andScorpion Bmkb1. GRAVY: 1.56; M. Wt: 1875.289; mol formula: C93H145N19O22; molar extinction coefficient: 0.Activity: Mainly active against Gram+ bacteria such as S. epidermidis ATCC 12228 (MIC 7.5 uM) and S. aureus (5 uM). and moderately active against Gram- E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 50 uM), S. enterica ATCC 10708 (60 uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (40uM), A. baumannii ATCC 19606 (MIC 20 uM), and K. pneumoniae (60 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Almaaytah A, Ajingi Y, Abualhaijaa A, Tarazi S, Alshar'i N, Al-Balas Q.
Literature Information.Title: Peptide consensus sequence determination for the enhancement of the antimicrobial activity and selectivity of antimicrobial peptides.
